Reviews.Title: 58 mm Macro Close up Kit with lenses
Reviews.Author: Robert W. Soper
Reviews.Content: I am a student in forensic science and this is the best deal I could find for these lenses I need for coursework.  Excellent packaging and fast delivery is great.

Reviews.Title: What a great Price for the assortment
Reviews.Author: Joan
Reviews.Content: I use the lens for some amazing shots on my trip to New England, The pictures that I took with my telephoto where great. However, watching your len and view will show a circular cut off. Did make for me some neat shots but it can cut off some great areas in the shot. Some shots may cause a out of focus soft look around the edges. But have fun with it. Still have not gotten to use all the filters so will update

Reviews.Title: Wrong item received!
Reviews.Author: Richard Bond
Reviews.Content: For the second time, I received the wrong item; instead of the 58mm package I received a digital camera charger: what's up with this mistake being repeated twice and I really wanted the 58mm package; what a disappointment!
